show-seconds-hand.tooltip: Show or hide the seconds hand.

smooth-seconds-hand.tooltip: Use smooth seconds hand animation instead of refreshing it only every second.

scale-size.tooltip:
Increase or decrease the size of the battery using this scale factor.
Best appearance on 1.00 and 0.75. Use values greater than 1.00 only on high-res displays.

head2.description: Custom desklet label (only visible if decorations are enabled)

use-custom-label.tooltip: Checking this box allows you to set a custom label in the field below.

custom-label.tooltip: Set your custom label here, e.g. for multiple timezones. This field is unavailable unless the checkbox above is enabled.

use-custom-tz.tooltip: Checking this box allows you to set a custom timezone in the field below.

img-s.tooltip: Choose your own image for the seconds hand. Should be as big as the background image.

img-m.tooltip: Choose your own image for the minute hand. Should be as big as the background image.

img-h.tooltip: Choose your own image for the hour hand. Should be as big as the background image.
